html: (2 Nephi 21:10)."Ensign of the people." The Prophet Joseph Smith, and his successors in the presidency of the Church he was directed to establish, are the "ensign of the people" to whom the Saints of the latter days will look for direction, as these prophets speak the word of the Lord. Truly, the phrase "follow the prophet" is a rallying cry for the righteous and their way of safety. (The "ensign to[or for] the nations" is discussed in the commentary in verse 12, as well as in Isaiah 49:22 and Isaiah 5:26.)
